message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $140. I believe it's worth much more, but I'm happy to offer you this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay that much for the product.
I understand your position, Bob, but I can't go as low as $130.  How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to pay that much for the product.
